document_data.mainbody:
Brant Hallower was a werewolf servant of Selûne and member of the New Moon Pact in the 8 century DR.
As a werewolf, Brant appeared as a heavily-built white wolf with bright eyes.
Brant served Selûne as a werewolf of the New Moon Pact, fighting against the faiths enemies in the darkness. In 757 DR, the High Moonmistress Brima Chintamn of Bright Ladys Tower in Chancelgaunt declared the New Moon Pact a heresy, and Brant and many other members were hunted down and executed.
When Feena Archwood investigated the mystery of the New Moon Pact in 1373 DR, Brants spirit appeared in her dreams alongside the other members of the Pact to defend and guide her. After she uncovered Velsinores heresy and they mutually slew each other, Feenas spirit was met by a Shard escort to the afterlife, but the spirits of the Pact members encouraged her to return to life and join the New Moon Pact herself. With the aid of Julith Harkspurs healing, Feena was revived and ultimately continued the legacy of the Pact.
